description:
The perfect wedding dress and ring are the dream of every young bride.
Help Lucille, a kind and extremely talented fashion designer, dress up all the girls that need her unique skills in order to have an unforgettable wedding ceremony!
Show that you’re also a good time manager and dash to tend to every client of a busy bridal shop. Work hard with Lucille to make the business grow: you never know when YOU will be the one in need of its wonderful bridal services!
HIGHLIGHTS
👰DASH to design and sew beautiful wedding dresses while running a vibrant wedding salon in many thrilling time-management levels!
💐WATCH your clients expressions and happiness levels closely and make sure every girl leaves your shop satisfied and ready for their happy endings!
👰UPGRADE your store and items to dress up the increasing number of girls interested in your fancy gowns and bridal services!
💐PROVE your unique talents in fun minigames that will make you feel like a famous wedding gown maker!
The most expensive make-up, the most lavish hairstyle and even a reception and ceremony at the most exclusive venue in town can’t compensate for a bland wedding dress!
That’s why your work is so vital for the bridal shop’s success. Make Lucille’s clients (like Sally, Emily, Angela or even Gordon) walk out of the salon looking like supermodel brides and just watch as the Stunning Bridal wedding salon becomes the talk of the town among girls!
Fulfill every item in wedding planners’ demanding checklists and prove that running a bridal shop is so much more than playing dress up: you need top management skills and raw talent to make it big!
Start your new wedding salon job now!
Forget about diner or cooking. Having your own wedding salon is much more cool! Your clients want the best marriage ever to make all their friends jealous.
The best wedding game!
Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

title: Wedding Salon Dash - Bridal Shop Simulator Game
